column4: i need a blazingly fast way to delete certain words from a large corpus of texts... I'm currently using sed. Does anyone know if there is a faster tool that I should be using?
also, is jaunty coming out on thursday?
yep, and I am looking foward to being in here, when people are  wondering how to shut it down and logout, because they removed that from the system menu,  it will make my day, if someone asks
